articles.description: You can now welcome more augmented reality versions of animals into your home or other space using Google Search on your mobile device, and selecting “view in 3D”
articles.content:

articles.author: Brittany Vincent
articles.title: Google Drive Update Makes It Less Annoying to Search on Mobile - PCMag
articles.description: Google teases an update that improves search functionality across its Drive app, including search suggestions and the ability to 're-run' desktop searches.
articles.content:
Google Drive is a versatile desktop suite, but its mobile version can be frustrating. It's easy enough to open and edit files, but searching through documents can be a pain.

articles.author: Joe Fedewa
articles.title: How to Share Tweets to Snapchat Stories - How-To Geek
articles.description: There was a time when sharing a tweet to Snapchat meant taking a screenshot of the Twitter app and uploading it to Snapchat. Thankfully, that’s no longer necessary. Tweets can be directly shared to Snapchat as stickers for your stories.
